entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
